name: MEC 12 Hr Tote Bag - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description:
Intelligent carry for your every day life. This tote carries everything you need for a day on the go. Internal organization keeps your laptop, phone and tablet protected, yet easy to access. Convertible straps give you 2 ways to carry it.Made of durable and water-resistant polyester.Comfortable webbing tote straps convert to backpack straps when the load gets too heavy.Roll-top opening adds security and weather protection.Inner organizer pockets for batteries and cables, with fleece-lined sleeves for a tablet and 13in. laptop.Hidden daisy chains can be deployed to attach extra gear or clip on a blinky bike light.

        Sustainability
